title: International Conference on Typography and Visual Communication
content:
Also known as Thessaloniki. Organized by [University of Macedonia Press](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017024708/http:/afroditi.uom.gr/uompress/enindex.html), and held at University of Macedonia, Thessaloniki, Greece.

1st International Conference on Typography and Visual Communication, History - Theory - Education, 26-30 June 2002

2nd International Conference on Typography and Visual Communication: [Communication and New Technologies](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017024708/http:/afroditi.uom.gr/uompress/2nd_int_conference/), 24-29 June 2004

3rd International Conference on Typography and Visual Communication: From verrbal to graphic 20-23 June 2007
author: James Grieshaber
